alert.note: Alert for Clay (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 23 at 2:24AM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Clay County. In Nebraska, Dakota and Dixon Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 AM CDT early this morning. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated stronger winds are possible near any thunderstorms. The strong winds will also lead to elevated fire danger.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
